fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Heal someone, Giving them Basic defense.
- Freeze someone, attacking them, if they have Roleblock immunity this will fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only target yourself once.
- Your Heal ability gets upgraded after repeated uses:
• 1 use - Upgraded to Powerful defense
• 2 uses - Now gives Roleblock and Redirect immunity.
• 3 uses - You will learn who visits your target.
- Your Freeze ability also gets upgraded after repeated uses:
• 1 use - Upgraded to Powerful attack
• 2 uses - If your target dies their action will fail, now Ignores Roleblock immunity.
• 3 uses - You will learn who your target has targeted this night if they die.
• 4 uses - Unstoppable attack, your target will have their roles Cleaned.
- Conversion Immunity.
